data.title: A Night of Mystery
data.description: Mayhem. Murder. Mystery. A sinister cast of characters looks to ravage a mansion of its riches. With so much at stake and so little time to figure out the clues, you will be rushing to play A Night of Mystery. This game features compelling characters, incredible game play, and enrapturing music in the bonus round. 3 by 5 reels. 9 and 40 paylines. Stacked Symbols, Stacked Wilds, and The Clue Collection Bonus.

In this game, good fortune will befall you once you learn the true meaning of the season and embrace the holiday spirit. Beware the Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present and Yet to Come and heed what they say. Don't end up being a Scrooge this holiday season. Bah, Humbug! 4 x 6 reels. 10 and 50 paylines. Super Stacks.

data.long_summary: High 5 Games brings a beloved holiday tale to life. With Super Stacks, there's no reason to act like Scrooge when playing Bah, Humbug!

data.title: Bear Mountain
data.description:
Glistening in the distance, this mysterious mountain beckons to intrepid explorers. Adventurers beware - it's a grizzly place where careless trekkers could find themselves face-to-face with a variety of hungry bears. Stay on the course to reach the summit because buried deep in the snow caps, ancient riches await. Do you have what it takes to conquer Bear Mountain?

Special features like Stacked Symbols and the Mountain Multiplier feature will have players clawing at wins in this epic game. The Mountain Multiplier feature in Bear Mountain's bonus round multiplies the entire total winnings of the free games, if the player captures all five letters of the word 'bonus.' This total can be multiplied anywhere from 3x to 10x, depending on what mystery symbol the player chooses at the conclusion of the bonus round.

Bear Mountain. Winter is over. Hibernation has ended. Feasting has begun. 3 by 5 reels. 20 and 40 paylines. Special Features: Stacked Wilds, Stacked Symbols, and the Mountain Multiplier feature.
data.short_summary: Stacked Wilds and the Mountain Multiplier will help you win big in Bear Mountain!
data.long_summary: Prepare to go head-to-head with some of nature's fiercest creatures! Stacked Wilds and the Mountain Multiplier will have you clawing at big wins in Bear Mountain!

data.title: Betti the Yetti
data.description: For many casino players, there will never be another game quite like Betti the Yetti. Providing a new twist on a celebrated tale, this game is recognized for its lively animations, unique game play, and an adventure bonus round that is incomparable to anything else out on the market. Before there were paparazzi... before there were hunters... there was Betti the Yetti! 3 by 5 reels. 30 paylines.

data.long_summary: Re-introduce yourself to a land-based casino classic with Betti the Yetti! Wild Multipliers and the Stepping Out Bonus Round lead to big wins!

data.title: Birds of Wonder
data.description: The colorful plumage and effortless flight of birds have been a source of awe and inspiration for humans throughout history. Without them, Icarus would never have burnt to a crisp, Da Vinci would not have sketched flying machines, and the Wright Brothers would have been anonymous bicycle makers lost to history. Break loose from whatever is caging you in and fly free with Birds of Wonder. 4 by 5 reels. 30 paylines AND 1024 ways to win. Independent Reels and Retriggerable Bonus Round.
data.short_summary: Independent Reels and both lines and ways help your bank account soar in Birds of Wonder!
data.long_summary: Break loose and fly free in Birds of Wonder! Independent Reels and both lines and ways help your bank account soar!

data.title: Black Widow
data.description:
There's something about the Black Widow - a certain kind of charm, a devilish kind of appeal. Unmistakably and inexplicably, they are drawn to her. But her hopeful suitors ought to tread lightly, for she will spare no effort in capturing them for her own gain. In this exhilarating game, players can use the Black Widow's capture skills to rake in massive rewards for themselves. But be careful she doesn't turn on you first...

Introducing High 5 Games' new Capture Feature, Black Widow's Web Capture creates a bonus round that will invigorate even the most experienced of slot players. In this bonus round, the middle spot on the middle reel will 'capture' any character that falls into its grasp. If any of the suitors fall prey, the player will win whatever amount of credits is in that character's respective credit meter. Because it's a progressive feature, if you capture a character more than once, you will get even more bonus credits each time. Land the Black Widow in the Capture square, and you are awarded the full meters of every single character.
data.short_summary: Black Widow's Web Capture creates a bonus round that will invigorate even the most experienced of slot players.
data.long_summary: In this exhilarating game, players can use the Black Widow's capture skills to rake in massive rewards for themselves.

data.title: Cat Prince
data.description: Cats were more than just fuzzy, playful companions in ancient Egypt. They were symbols of grace and poise to the culture that first domesticated them, and eventually became revered enough to represent Egyptian deities. Some cats were even mummified after death like their human counterparts. Journey back to this famed civilization with H5G's Cat Prince. With the help of some feline friends, you'll rule Egypt while collecting big wins for your service! 3 by 5 reels. 40 paylines. Super Stacks with Multipliers.
data.short_summary: Super Stacks with Multipliers and the Pick-A-Super-Stack feature during free games lead to big wins in Cat Prince!
data.long_summary: Nothing will stand in the way of the Cat Prince. Super Stacks with Multipliers and the Pick-A-Super-Stack feature during free games lead to big wins!

data.title: Cats
data.description: Across the African plains, these deadly predators look for their next conquest. Beautifully agile and incredibly powerful, these cats are ferocious and unforgiving when attacking their prey. Join them as they feast on their rewards. Cats, a game celebrated for its beautiful artwork, thrilling game play, and mesmerizing sounds, is one of the most popular video reel slot machine games of all time. It features split symbols, which gives players the chance to get up to 10 symbols on any given line because any one spot can contain two symbols. It also features scatter symbols, which award extra bonuses and free spins. Cats. Dignified, but deadly. Calm, yet ferocious. They lurk in the shadows, preparing to pounce. 3 by 5 reels. 30 paylines. Special Feature: Split Symbols. Note: This game also has a Multiplay version. Cats Multiplay allows you to play four separate Cats games at once.

data.description: A lover and a fighter - the two sides of the great Cyrano. One moment, he is a fierce warrior - defending his honor to the death and challenging anyone within sniffing distance to a duel. data.title: Da Vinci Diamonds Dual Play
data.description:
Da Vinci Diamonds Dual Play provides double Tumbling Reels action and double the fun of our original mega-hit game, and all time IGT classic title, Da Vinci Diamonds™. Symbols from the top game tumble down to replace symbols in the bottom game, leading to even more wins for the player.
Three Bonus symbols on a payline trigger the Extra Paylines Free Spins Bonus with six initial free spins. Players are granted 20 additional paylines for the duration of the Bonus, providing 60 ways to win on each free spin.

data.title: Lucky Horse
data.description:
Your horse trots to the gate, resplendent under a bright blue sky. As you look over the competition, you feel confident that the choice you made was the right one. The race begins, and as the horses start to thunder down the track yours pulls gracefully ahead. Maybe today really is your lucky day...

Lucky Horse offers plenty of paths to victory by awarding five paylines for every credit played, and an additional 16 free paylines for playing all lines. That means players get 466 paylines for only 90 credits! Lucky Horse also features Horizontal Expanding Wilds, which creates lots of big and exciting combinations!

Lucky Horse. A horse worth betting on... 4 by 6 reels. 466 paylines. Special Features: Stacked Wilds, Connected Lines, and Horizontal Expanding Wilds.

data.long_summary: Bow down to the Valkyrie Queen, or face the consequences! Tumbling Reels with 243 Ways to Win lead to huge jackpots in this game based on Norse mythology!

data.title: Vivaldi's Seasons
data.description: The seasons resonate with people, as does the classic work by the great Italian composer Antonio Vivaldi. In this homage to the legendary musician from three centuries ago, High 5 Games has created a striking new hit for the casino market in Vivaldi's Seasons. 3 by 5 reels. 10 and 40 paylines.
data.short_summary: Super Stacks and the Pick-a-Super-Stack Feature lead to huge wins in Vivaldi's Seasons!
data.long_summary: Like the features in Golden Goddess? Then you'll love Vivaldi's Seasons! Super Stacks and the Pick-a-Super-Stack Feature lead to huge wins!

data.title: West Journey Treasure Hunt
data.description: Join a bold quest across uncharted terrain in West Journey Treasure Hunt! Super Stacks with Multipliers make your adventure a lucrative one!
data.short_summary: Super Stacks with Multipliers make your adventure a lucrative one in West Journey Treasure Hunt!
data.long_summary: Join a bold quest across uncharted terrain in West Journey Treasure Hunt! Super Stacks with Multipliers make your adventure a lucrative one!

data.title: White Falls
data.description: White Falls depicts a fascinating and serene atmosphere for players looking to escape the commotion of ordinary life for a while. With a dazzling heroine, stunning graphics, and a rewarding bonus round, players will fall in love with this new hit game. Get wild, let loose, and take the plunge! 4 by 6 reels. 466 paylines. Stacked Wilds, Connected Lines, and Horizontal Expanding Wilds.
data.short_summary: Stacked Wilds, Connected Lines, and Horizontal Expanding Wilds create dazzling jackpots in White Falls!
data.long_summary: Let the good times rain down upon you in White Falls! Stacked Wilds, Connected Lines, and Horizontal Expanding Wilds create dazzling jackpots!

data.title: White Lion
data.description: Stand out from the pack! White Lion will have you roaring into riches with ReSpin on Win and Scatter Awards!
data.short_summary: With ReSpin on Win and Scatter Awards, White Lion promises to be a roaring good time.
data.long_summary: Stand out from the pack! White Lion will have you roaring into riches with ReSpin on Win and Scatter Awards!

data.title: White Orchid
data.description: There are more than 25,000 species of orchids. That's more than twice the number of bird species and four times the number of mammal species! With each orchid beautifully unique, players will undoubtedly be mesmerized by the depictions in H5G's new hit classic, White Orchid. White Orchid has both paylines and ways, giving players seemingly endless possibilities to win. For just 80 credits, players are eligible for 40 paylines and 1,024 ways! This game also features a retriggering bonus round that can award up to 130 free spins! White Orchid. An intricate and exotic display of nature that demands the attention of any passerby... 4 by 5 reels. 40 paylines and 1,024 ways. Special Features: Independent Reels and a Bonus Round with up to 130 Free Spins.
data.short_summary: White Orchid has both paylines and ways, giving players seemingly endless possibilities to win.
data.long_summary: An intricate and exotic display of nature that demands the attention of any passerby, featuring Independent Reels and a Bonus Round with up to 130 Free Spins.

data.title: Wild Rodeo
data.description: Calling all cowboys and cowgirls: Wild Rodeo is in town, and it is not to be missed! Come on down for a night of good old-fashioned fun. Wild Connections helps you lasso big wins - if any of Wild Rodeo's 178 paylines passes through trigger symbols that are found on reels two and four, then the triggers and all the symbols between them along that line become wild - while Connected Lines makes determining wins more intuitive than ever. 4 by 5 reels. 178 paylines. Wild Connections and Connected Lines.
data.short_summary: Lasso massive payouts with Wild Connections in Wild Rodeo!
data.long_summary: Calling all cowboys and cowgirls! Wild Connections takes you on the ride of your life in Wild Rodeo!

data.title: Witches Riches
data.description: These ladies don't quite look like the witches of yesteryear. The modern-day witch uses both spells and her devilish charm to get what she wants. In Witches Riches, they're after diamonds and jewels in their quest for wealth and absolute power. Cauldrons and crooked teeth are so 18th century. Meet the new generation of the wicked. 3 by 5 reels. 40 paylines.
data.short_summary: Doubled Wild Wins and Tripled Wins during free games lead to wicked wins in Witches Riches!
data.long_summary: Meet the new generation of the wicked in Witches Riches! Doubled Wild Wins and Tripled Wins during free games lead to huge wins!

data.title: Zen Panda
data.description: Find your bliss in Zen Panda! Super Symbols leads to big wins that help your peace of mind!

data.long_summary: Find your bliss in Zen Panda! Super Symbols leads to big wins that help your peace of mind!
